member.name: T:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Accordion
member.summary: Wraps a group of AccordionItem controls to create an accordion-like behavior.
Builds the inner content of the control.
member.param: Gets or sets an index of expanded accordion item. If none of the accordion items are expanded, the index is set to -1.
member.capability-param: Gets or sets a custom template for accordion item content when DataSource is set.
Gets or sets a plain text for accordion item content when DataSource is set.
Gets or sets a custom template for accordion item header when DataSource is set.
Gets or sets a plain text for accordion item header when DataSource is set.

member.name: T:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Alert
member.summary: Displays contextual feedback messages for users.
Builds the inner content of the control.
member.capability-param: Gets or sets a custom template for the alert header.
Gets or sets a plain text for the alert header.
member.param: Gets or sets the type of the alert. Possible values are Primary, Secondary, Success, Danger, Warning, Info, Light and Dark.
Gets or sets whether a close icon should be displayed in the top right corner of the alert.
Gets or sets a boolean binding whether the alert has been dismissed.
Gets or sets the command that will be triggered when the alert is dismissed.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Capabilities.BorderCapability.BorderPositions
member.summary: Sets or gets a comma-separated list of border positions. Possible values are Full, Top, Bottom, Left, Right.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Capabilities.BorderCapability.BorderColor
member.summary: Sets or gets the border color. Possible values are Primary, Secondary, Success, Danger, Warning, Info, Light, Dark, White.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Capabilities.BorderCapability.BorderRadius
member.summary: Sets or gets a comma-separated list of border radius values. Possible values are Full, Top, Bottom, Left, Right, Circle, Pill.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Capabilities.BorderCapability.BorderRadiusSize
member.summary: Sets or gets the border radius size. Possible values are XSmall, Small, Medium, Large, XLarge.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Capabilities.BorderCapability.BorderOpacity
member.summary: Sets or gets the border radius opacity. Possible values are XLow (10%), Low (25%), Medium(50%), High(75%), XHigh(100%).

member.name: P:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Capabilities.BorderCapability.BorderWidth
member.summary: Sets or gets the border width. Possible values are XSmall, Small, Medium, Large, XLarge.

member.summary: Gets or sets the items inside the control.

member.summary: Capability represents a set of properties for a single item in Bootstrap lists and menus.

member.summary: Gets or sets the class for all screens.

member.summary: Gets or sets the class for a small screen. Bootstrap `sm` CSS class.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Capabilities.ResponsiveValueCapability`1.Medium
member.summary: Gets or sets the class for a medium screen. Bootstrap `md` CSS class.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Capabilities.ResponsiveValueCapability`1.Large
member.summary: Gets or sets the class for a large screen. Bootstrap `lg` CSS class.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Capabilities.ResponsiveValueCapability`1.XLarge
member.summary: Gets or sets the class for a very large screens. Bootstrap `xl` CSS class.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Capabilities.ResponsiveValueCapability`1.XXLarge
member.summary: Gets or sets the class for the largest screen. Bootstrap `xxl` CSS class.

member.name: T:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Card
member.summary: Renders a bootstrap card component

member.name: M:DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.Card.GetContents(DotVVM.Framework.Controls.HtmlCapability,DotVVM.Bootstrap5.Controls.CardCapability)
member.summary: Builds the inner content of the control.
member.capability-param: Gets or sets the control title text. H5 tag is used.
Gets or sets the control subtitle text. H6 tag is used.
Gets or sets a custom template for the card content. Cannot be combined with a `Text` property.
Gets or sets a plain text for card content. Cannot be combined with any custom content inside the card.
Gets or sets a custom template for card header. Cannot be combined with a `HeaderText` property.
Gets or sets a plain text for card header. Cannot be combined with a `HeaderTemplate` property.
Gets or sets a custom template for card footer. Cannot be combined with a `FooterText` property.
Gets or sets a plain text for card footer. Cannot be combined with a `FooterTemplate` property.

GroupType is not compatible with item types `Button` or `Link`. Items in group could be numbered or rendered from edge-to-edge.
